Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Ratan Tata tweeted an insulting message about PM Modi.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of the alleged tweet by stating that it would ruin the country and increase the popularity of PM Modi.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the existence of the insulting tweet from Ratan Tata.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the false image of the tweet accurately represents Ratan Tata's views and opinions.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the false image was created to spread misinformation or defame Ratan Tata.
